document_title: Potential Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability in FortiDB

documentpublisher.contact_details:
Fortinet PSIRT Contact:
            Email: vulnwatch@fortinet.com
            Website: fortiguard.com/psirt-pgpkey

note.text: FortiDB does not sanitize user input properly under limited circumstances. The vulnerability could allow an attacker to inject malicious script code.
